title: Homepage content

content:
Intro # This is a personal page that I created to try my hand at blogging and technical writing. I like to tinker with tech and always had an interest in pushing the potential of older computers. I’m hoping to share share my experiences, side projects in tech that I’ve found fun and interesting. Although I’ve created pages for internal clients during my day job, it is nice to build something that will be long living and share. The influence for this page also comes from the Cloud Resume challenge by Forrest Brazeal. Aside from sharing my findings but also sharing as documentation for my current setups. My first set of posts will focus on the upgrades to my home lab infrastructure setup and current learnings.
Thanks for reading and enjoy the rest of your day
summary: Learn more about me and why I am starting this blog.
title: My First Blog Post

content:
Hi there, I’m Daniel ğŸ‘‹ # I’m an engineer located in Toronto, Canada and I work specifically in the field of platform engineering and cloud infrastructure.
I always loved working with electronics and tweaking my PC for optimal performance as a hobby and this led me to a career focusing on networking, infrastructure and development. The idea of learning in public piqued my interest since I’ve always been dabbling and trying new things and taking notes so this helps to formalize and share them. I created this page is to share my work, personal learning, interests and random facts.
Contact # You can contact me via email at daniel@dtledev.ca or via LinkedIn
Disclaimer # All opinions on this site are my own and do not necessarily represent the views of my employer.

title: About
